TopicTitle: Adding Parts In Symmetry On Parts Placed In The Same Symmetry Doesnt Always Work As Expected

Articles.Content:
Reported Version: v0.2.0 (latest) | Mods: none | Can replicate without mods? Yes 
OS: Windows 10, 64bit | CPU: 11th Gen Intel I7-11700 @ 2.5GHz | GPU: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1660 SUPER | RAM: 16 GB

 

Severity - Low

Frequency - High

 

When trying to place parts on parts that have already been radially or symmetrically attached they are placed in large amounts. For example. 4 boosters have been attached to a core, separation motors then are added to the boosters with radial setting of 4, this causes 4 motors to be placed on each booster equaling to 16 separation motors.

Edited December 30, 2023 by The Space Peacock
